title: Lex Talionis
description: Alexandria Ross was only sure about one thing: her best friend Miranda. So when the seemingly random act of violence that steals Randi's life is revealed as cold-blooded murder, Andria doesn't get mad... She gets even. Driven with purpose, she changes the course of her life to set the scales of justice back in balance. Psychological warfare is her specialty, and the secrets of her enemies are her weapons. The players take their positions on the boardâ€¦ But little do they know that the game is rigged. Alexandria controls every move. Lex Talionis: let the punishment fit the crime.
author: S.A. Huchton
